DOC.brief_summary: Subjects with diabetes and study staff used an investigational blood glucose monitoring system.
DOC.brief_title: Performance of an Investigational Blood Glucose Monitoring System in a Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Males and females, 18 years of age and above Diagnosed as having type 1 or type 2 diabetes Currently selftesting blood glucose at home for at least three months Able to speak, read, and understand English Willing to complete all study procedures Gestational Diabetes Hemophilia or any other bleeding disorder Employee of competitive medical device company
